contest-event.event-date: Oct. 2, 1965 D National Mineworkers (Fourth Section) National Mineworkers (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-fourth-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003.
